productDescription: Embark on a tropical adventure to the pristine beaches and lush rainforests of Costa Rica.
productHighlights: Spot exotic wildlife in Manuel Antonio National Park
videoIntelligenceDescription: This video showcases the natural beauty of Costa Rica. From its stunning beaches to its diverse wildlife, Costa Rica is a paradise for nature enthusiasts and adventure seekers.
videoTextOnScreen: Experience the wonders of Costa Rica
Discover the biodiversity of the country
